#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define total 5000005
#define Me 1000000000001
#define NIL 0
#define MAXN 100005
#define EPS 1e-5
#define INF (1<<28)
#define pi 3.141593
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
vector<pair<int,int> >v;
int main(){
	int t,n,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		int st,en;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			scanf("%d%d",&st,&en);
			v.pb(mp(en,st));
		}
		sort(all(v));
		st=-1;
		int ans=0;
		for(i=0;i<v.size();i++){
			if(v[i].second>st){
				ans++;
				st=v[i].first;
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans);
		v.clear();
	}
	return 0;
}
